about_the_game:
What is FluidFrames?

Introducing FluidFrames, the AI-powered app designed to transform your videos like never before.

With FluidFrames, you can double (x2), quadruple (x4), octuple (x8) the FPS in your videos, creating ultra-smooth and high-definition playback.

Want to slow things down? FluidFrames also allows you to convert any video into stunning slow-motion, bringing every detail to life.

Perfect for content creators, videographers, and anyone looking to enhance their visual media, FluidFrames provides an intuitive and powerful toolset to elevate your video projects.

Other AI apps.

QualityScaler - image/video AI upscaler app

Features.

  • Elegant and easy to use GUI

  • Resize video before frame generation

  • Multiple GPUs support

  • Compatible with all GPUs (AMD, Intel, Nvidia)

  • Compatible video - mp4, wemb, mkv, flv, gif, avi, mov, mpg, qt, 3gp

  • Video frame-generation STOP&RESUME

  • PRIVACY FOCUSED - no internet connection required / everything is on your PC

  • Video frames generation

    • 30fps => x2 => 60fps

    • 30fps => x4 => 120fps

    • 30fps => x8 => 240fps

  • Video slowmotion

    • 30fps => x2 slowmotion => 30fps - 2 times slower

    • 30fps => x4 slowmotion => 30fps - 4 times slower

    • 30fps => x8 slowmotion => 30fps - 8 times slower

What is FluidFrames?

Introducing FluidFrames, the AI-powered app designed to transform your videos like never before.

With FluidFrames, you can double (x2), quadruple (x4), octuple (x8) the FPS in your videos, creating ultra-smooth and high-definition playback.

Want to slow things down? FluidFrames also allows you to convert any video into stunning slow-motion, bringing every detail to life.

Perfect for content creators, videographers, and anyone looking to enhance their visual media, FluidFrames provides an intuitive and powerful toolset to elevate your video projects.

Other AI apps.

  • Resize video before frame generation

  • Compatible with all GPUs (AMD, Intel, Nvidia)

  • Compatible video - mp4, wemb, mkv, flv, gif, avi, mov, mpg, qt, 3gp

  • Video frame-generation STOP&RESUME

name: FluidFrames

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Any CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Directx12 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Any CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Directx12 compatible GPU >= 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 32 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to FluidFrames, the AI-powered app designed to transform your videos like never before. double (x2), quadruple (x4), or even octuple (x8) the fps in your videos.
